name: pdf-to-flipbook
description: Convert PDF files to interactive web-based flipbooks

scripts.pkg: pkg --output flipbook dist/flipbook --targets node18-macos-arm64,node18-macos-x64,node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64 --compress GZip --public --assets node_modules/sharp/vendor:sharp/vendor --assets node_modules/sharp/build:sharp/build
scripts.pkg:build: npm run build && npm run bundle && npm run pkg
scripts.pkg:rebuild: npm run clean && npm run check:node && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm run pkg:build
scripts.check:node: node -e "const v=process.version.match(/^v(\d+)/)[1]; if(v!=='18'){console.error('❌ Wrong Node.js version! Expected v18, got v'+v); console.error('Run: nvm use 18'); process.exit(1);} console.log('✅ Node.js v'+v+' ✓')"

author: PDF to Flipbook
